articles.description: Ibrahim Qadri, an internet sensation and Shah Rukh Khan doppelganger, recently recreated a scene from the Jawan prevue in an Instagram video. The video quickly went viral, garnering over 117K views and 21K likes.
articles.content: Shah Rukh Khan's upcoming film Jawan, also starring Vijay Sethupathi, Nayanthara, Priyamani, Sanya Malhotra, and Deepika Padukone, is all set to release on 7 September. Directed by Atlee, the film's … [+387 chars]
